name: Builders FirstSource, Inc.
description: Builders FirstSource, Inc. is a leading supplier and manufacturer of building materials for residential and commercial construction. Founded in 1998, the company has grown through strategic acquisitions and organic growth to become one of the largest suppliers of building materials in the United States. Builders FirstSource offers a wide range of products, including lumber, engineered wood products, trusses, and millwork, as well as a variety of components and manufactured products. The company serves a diverse customer base, including professional builders, contractors, and remodelers, and is committed to providing high-quality products and exceptional service. With a focus on innovation, Builders FirstSource continuously seeks to improve its offerings and operational efficiencies, leveraging technology to enhance customer experiences and streamline processes. The company operates numerous manufacturing and distribution facilities across the country, enabling it to meet the needs of its customers effectively. Builders FirstSource believes in building lasting relationships with its customers, suppliers, and employees, and is dedicated to sustainability practices that minimize environmental impact while supporting the communities in which it operates.
